Member Data Documentation

const char* RailsConfig::base_uri

The base URI at which the Rails application operates.

char* RailsConfig::base_uri_with_slash

The same as base_uri, but with a trailing slash.

This is to make matching URIs easier.

const char* RailsConfig::env

The environment (i.e.

value for RAILS_ENV) under which the Rails application should operate.
